services.title: Mechanical Engineering Design
services.content: We offer detailed mechanical design services for equipment and systems, ensuring reliable and efficient performance throughout their operational lifecycle.
features: Rotating and static equipment design (pumps, compressors, heat exchangers)
Mechanical data sheets and procurement support

services.title: Piping Engineering and Design
services.content: Our piping design services ensure that your piping systems are safe, efficient, and compliant with industry regulations, providing layouts that integrate seamlessly with other disciplines.

services.title: Electrical Engineering Design
services.content: We deliver detailed electrical design solutions that power your facility efficiently while adhering to the latest safety and environmental standards.
features: Electrical load analysis and short circuit studies
Earthing, grounding, and lightning protection systems

services.title: Instrumentation and Control Systems Design
services.content: Our team provides integrated instrumentation and control system designs that enhance operational efficiency and safety, tailored to meet your facility's specific needs.
features: Distributed control systems (DCS) and programmable logic controllers (PLC)
Safety instrumented systems (SIS) and emergency shutdown systems (ESD)

services.title: Civil and Structural Engineering Design
services.content: We provide detailed civil and structural engineering services for all types of industrial facilities, ensuring safety, stability, and regulatory compliance.

services.title: Process Engineering Design
services.content: Our process engineering team develops safe, efficient, and optimized designs that meet operational requirements while improving process performance and minimizing risks.
features: Process flow diagrams (PFD) and P&ID development

services.title: 3D Modeling and CAD Services
services.content: Using advanced 3D modeling tools, we create accurate representations of your project, improving design accuracy, coordination between disciplines, and construction planning.
features: 3D plant modeling (AutoCAD, E3D, SP3D, CADWORX, AutoCAD PLANT3D)

services.title: Procurement Support and Vendor Coordination
services.content: We assist clients with the procurement process, ensuring that all materials and equipment are specified correctly and procured efficiently.
features: Vendor bid evaluations and technical clarifications
Equipment data sheets and material requisitions
Inspection and quality assurance for procured items

services.title: Construction Support and Field Engineering
services.content: Our construction support services ensure that designs are implemented accurately on-site, offering real-time assistance to address any engineering challenges during construction.

services.title: Safety and Compliance Engineering
services.content: We ensure that all our detailed engineering designs adhere to local and international codes and safety regulations, mitigating risks and ensuring compliance across the project lifecycle.
features: Compliance with ASME, API, IEC, and other codes
Safety systems design and fire protection, HAZOP, SIL, and safety studies
